        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="76682" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="76682" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.12</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="116">116</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="30"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Chelsea Nights</b> by <b>Bond No 9</b> is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. <b>Chelsea Nights</b> was launched in 2022. The nose behind this fragrance is Miroslav Petkov. Top notes are Cacao, Hazelnut and Saffron; middle notes are Turmeric, Sesame and Rose; base notes are Suede, Patchouli, Agarwood (Oud), Vanilla, Amber, Myrrh and Tonka Bean. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Everyone is in the mood to have some fun. Meet our sexiest, spiciest fragrance yet. Known for nightlife, art galleries, and a diverse cast of residents, Chelsea is the opposite of basic. The spirit of Chelsea is channeled into a new fragrance that sizzles with sensuality and sophistication.</p>

<p>THE INSPIRATION</p>

<p>A typical night out in one of NYCs most dynamic neighborhoods might look something like this: Take a twilight stroll on The High Line, stop by an opening at one of its hundreds of art galleries, have a drink and a casual meal at a wine bar, then head out for a scandalous adventure at a boisterous nightclub. Chelsea Nightswith its intoxicating, luxurious scent is as lush, decadent, and complex as the destination itself. Originally named after the famous Chelsea Royal Hospital in London, this west side neighborhood shares many attributes with its namesake across the pond. While the original gained fame for attracting a bohemian crowd and being the epicenter of the U.K.s Swinging Sixties, the NYC incarnation is also known as an artists mecca. It is also globally recognized as a safe haven for its diverse community of LGBTQAI+ residents, boasts a rollicking nightlife scene, and is home to legendary iconic buildings ranging from the former Nabisco factory (now the culinary destination that is Chelsea Market) to the infamously storied Hotel Chelsea, and more recently, world-class shopping and distinctive new architecture, such as the stunning InterActiveCorp headquarters designed by Frank Gehry. Roughly bordered by the Hudson River and 14th Street up until about the upper 20s, this Manhattan neighborhood truly holds its own. Chelsea Nights encapsulates this strong, powerful personality.</p>

<p>THE COMPOSITION</p>

<p>Always gender neutral, Chelsea Nights is for anyone who wants to make a statement and is looking for a good time. Bond No.9 Founder Laurice Rahm was inspired by the landscapes newfound energetic spirit: Chelsea is making a big comeback. People are starved for freedom and fun and this area is known for all of that, she says. Its as if we are all birds coming out of the cage! This bold new fragrance reflects the many aspects of its Manhattan destination with its blend of gourmand and oriental composition. And just like a decadent night out, its undeniably sexy. Theres spicy and warm saffron and hazelnut at the top, an extremely unique blend of rose, turmeric, and sesame at its heart, and the juice is grounded in a robust, all-star lineup of sensual, smoky notes including patchouli, myrrh, amber, and black suede, among others. Its almost a bit of a sultry 70s nightlife mood, notes Rahm. This statement-making fragrance is made to last a whole night out and will get you home safely in the wee hours of the morning.</p>

<p>THE PACKAGING</p>

<p>With a cheeky nod to Chelseas colorful and vibrant gallery scene, the bottles font is inspired by a painterly brushstroke. The flashy neon and ombre tones suggest a decadent night on the town, and, not a shy one, Chelsea Nights is out, loud, and proud.</p>

<p>SUSTAINABILITY<br />
<br />
Responsible packaging is a pillar of Bond No. 9, and we strive to offer consumers the option to choose without compromising on luxury. Bond No. 9s iconic Silhouette Bottle is 100% recyclable and uses a 50% recycled cullet during manufacturing. Chelsea Nights may be purchased in traditional packaging or in sustainable packaging.</p>

<p>Chelsea Nights is available as 100ml Eau de Parfum.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a </div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem;     <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2355575" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2355575" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stephthirty"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2311766"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2311766.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stephthirty" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2355575ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2355575" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2311766">stephthirty</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-20">11/20/24 12:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this fragrance is definitely female leaning <br />
<br />
the dry down of this fragrance is really nice other than that its a real Nutella , nutty smelling scent i ended up giving it to my girlfriend i dont feel like its worth the price tag of it and its in my opinion worn better on a female ,  a guy could pull it off although if youre into gourmet edible type of smells</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="2355575"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=2355575#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2353923" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2353923" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TotallyAverageUSA"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/100400"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.100400.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TotallyAverageUSA" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Love-Delight-89959.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89959.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Love Delight"title="Love Delight"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2353923ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2353923" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/100400">TotallyAverageUSA</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-19">11/19/24 02:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm just a few minutes in to wearing sprays of this from a commercial sample; the cacao, hazelnut, suede and saffron lead for me (so far) - and it seems to be developing very nicely. I can so far characterize this as perfectly unisex (so they've done a fantastic job there!) <br />
It seems that this one projects moderately and I'll update regarding longevity. <br />
I will say that Chelsea Nights' hazelnut is more of a non-sweet/dry take on the note (it's lovely!) but that is to say that it differs from the sweet interpretation of hazelnut in Mugler's Angel Muse EDP.<br />
Edited to add: performance here is moderate or better based on what I've experienced of it in the last few hours. And, the longer I spend with this one, the more I am convinced that this has the single most realistic hazelnut note in all of perfumery.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2288429">jombajuiced</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-03">11/03/24 16:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm a sucker for cacao, and I wished they amplified the cacao more in this fragrance. I get more of the florals, leather, and woody notes more than the cacao itself. If you want something gourmand I'd steer away from this and look elsewhere. There's much better options for cheaper prices.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="2337114"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=2337114#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2277892" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2277892" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="K8lo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1987842"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1987842.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="K8lo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gritti/Duchessa-63729.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.63729.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Duchessa"title="Duchessa"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2277892ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2277892" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1987842">K8lo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-10">09/10/24 06:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love love love New Bond St (which has some similar base notes: cocoa, hazelnut, vanilla) so I thought naturally I would be obsessed with Chelsea Nights as well. Unfortunately this is an absolute patchouli BOMB on me. I like a light patchouli here and there, but this is very patch heavy. Lasts foreverrrrrr - I couldnt get it off my skin for a good 8+ hours! Sillage &amp; longevity are phenomenal if you like this one!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="2277892"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=2277892#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2256294" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2231963" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2231963" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FujiMoto"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2119923"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2119923.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FujiMoto" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Emporio-Armani-Stronger-With-You-Absolutely-64501.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64501.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Emporio Armani Stronger With You Absolutely"title="Emporio Armani Stronger With You Absolutely"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2231963ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2231963" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2119923">FujiMoto</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-28">07/28/24 12:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely delicious! I NEED THIS.<br />
<br />
I tried it out at Harrods and upon the first spray, it smelled exactly like freshly baked bread at a bakery! It is so warm and alluring, a perfect gourmand. As it dries down you have a beautiful trail of sweet but not cloying cocoa.<br />
<br />
UPDATE: Had to pick this one up. There really is not anything like this smell out there as far as I am aware. The bread note is uncanny and the cocoa dry down is so warm and inoffensive. This and lafayette street will be my hot/cold signatures for life.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="2231963"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=2231963#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2230253" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2230253" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eau de dosa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1313456"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1313456.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="eau de dosa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2230253ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2230253" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); The performance is awesome, I have just smelled better. It also leans a bit too masculine for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="2230253"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=2230253#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2221335" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2221335" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JcoAppie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1753965"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1753965.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JcoAppie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Althair-84109.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84109.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Althar"title="Althar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2221335ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2221335" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1753965">JcoAppie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-17">07/17/24 10:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sex in a bottle!  Spicy, nutty, warm with just the right amount of floral to keep it feminine. <br />
I will admit the first time I tried it, I sprayed too close to the skin and I did not enjoy it. It overwhelmed me and gave me a headache. But Im no quitter! I tried it again using the spray and walk into it method. Thats where its at folks!! Im so glad a tried it again because wowzers </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="2221335"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=2221335#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2191240" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2191240" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ty/dc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1327793"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1327793.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ty/dc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2191240ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2191240" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1327793">Ty/dc</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-17">06/17/24 15:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Chelsea Nights is the best cacao fragrance that Ive tried. I found the initial opening a little off putting but It quickly turns into a super smooth and pleasant blend of notes. <br />
<br />
Not blind buy worthy at this price but definitely one to get your nose on if youre looking for a beautiful cacao fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="2191240"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=2191240#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2079720" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2079720" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Snicole82"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/765170"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.765170.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Snicole82" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Lilac-Love-35624.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.35624.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lilac Love"title="Lilac Love"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2079720ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2079720" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/765170">Snicole82</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-02">03/02/24 04:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is an okay fragrance. Meaning its good enough, but I wouldnt get a sample or decant of it again. At first I layered it with Xerjoff Golden Dallah and thought those two together were amazing. Then wore it on its own, and it didnt move me. At first I thought I was getting cocoa, then realized that its probably more hazelnut and wood with some cocoa. Its okay. <br />
<br />
Longevity Great<br />
Sillage Great</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="2079720"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=2079720#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2072522" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; a little superior to Haltane although not much!! Ive always kept my other half with Mugler Angel Muse parfum because I love it on her..Its discontinued now &amp; its going for a lot of money where Chelsea Nights is starting to be seen discounted. I thought I would want this. But know she would love to have it with what ever the excact diff tweaks that are in this one!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="2072522"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=2072522#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2072443" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2072443" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sorachii_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2004024"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2004024.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sorachii_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2072443ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2072443" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2004024">sorachii_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-24">02/24/24 05:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nothing remarkable about this fragrance especially when you take into consideration the abysmally high price tag for it. Does it smell so good that Id consider purchasing a full bottle? Absolutely not. The scent is nutty, with some hints of cacao, saffron, and the oud isnt overpowering or in your face, its either well blended or my nose just doesnt pick it up. The scent is not syrupy, sticky sweet, or dense. It has a dusty quality to it and usually with gourmand fragrances, I prefer a creamy or smooth texture (I dont mind powdery/dusty textures in gourmands as long as the scent profile grips me). Bond No.9 may be an underrated perfume house, but what they have released and what Ive tried thus far doesnt justify the high price point whatsoever. The bottle designs are probably the only part of the perfume that I actually like. The scent is wearable, but it isnt great or anything groundbreaking as Ive smelled better  fragrances from niche and even designer houses that are far better in terms of value for your money.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="2072443"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=2072443#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2068838" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1974479">Nuits_de_85</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-16">01/16/24 18:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Best Bond no. 9 fragrance so far. A groundbreaking, addicting chocolate gourmand reminiscent of the Chelsea Hotel. The Chelsea Hotel is a fascinating building, just like Chelsea Nights. The longevity is also superior, but the price point is way too high</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="2033108"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=2033108#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2033104" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2033104" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yolis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341217"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1341217.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yolis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Delina-43871.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43871.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Delina"title="Delina"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2033104ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2033104" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341217">Yolis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-16">01/16/24 18:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Patchouli, Cacao, Saffron, Hazelnut are pretty much all I smell. Very well blended because it feels very balanced, I just can't place any other particular note, but this fragrance IS smooth. A masculine (leaning unisex) buttery gourmand. Don't think it's quite right for me, but I can acknowledge it's a good fragrance for someone who would enjoy this scent profile. Heavy hitter too, go light on the sprays. This could choke somebody out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="2033104"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=2033104#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2024964" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2024964" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Xela_529"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545982"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1545982.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Xela_529" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ella-K-Parfums/Melodie-D-Altai-48471.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48471.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Melodie D'Altai"title="Melodie D'Altai"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2024964ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2024964" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545982">Xela_529</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-08">01/08/24 20:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm starting to think Bond No 9 isn't the house for me. I have a couple of favorites, but a lot of what I've tried from them is a big miss for me. Chelsea Nights was the biggest let down of them all. I was SUPER excited to try her, what a bummer. <br />
<br />
I chuckled a little when I came across a Fragrantica article and the author described it as "oud butter". That's the perfect description, but it literally smells like butter. Think clarified butter they use in an American diner on the griddle. That plus the fun &amp; desirable notes that are listed. But the butter smell just ruins it for me. Womp Womp! I also interpret it as being super masculine.<br />
<br />
It seems like Bond really excels at marketing vs the actual juice in their fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="2024964"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=2024964#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2017102" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1949338">MrMrBrian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-01">01/01/24 13:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dont know I could be wrong But I gotta go back to Parfums De Marly Haltane and compare the two to see what the actual differences are before a full bottle purchase of this pricy monster! Im thinking its the praline in Haltane and chocolate in this one. This one seems like Its a Beastmode performer! I put this on me the last couple times in Sakks &amp; each time was blown away by this one! Not so much Haltane. I do love how the Vendors often wanna shit on Bond No 9!  I was just there smelling Maison Crivellis This dude keeps spraying Xerjoffs that I already own saying check out this one &amp; I keep saying No Or I have it So He says WHAT DID YOU COME FOR??? And I turned around right behind me &amp; pointed to the Bond counter &amp; before I could respond He says Why do you wanna go for trash when there is treasure..Hmmph The Haltane thru sampling gave me a hint of that MFK 540 vibe in it Or so I thought. Let me know if anyone has purchased  Chelsea Nights. Im eyeballing future reviews on this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="2017102"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=2017102#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1966701" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1966701" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="coffeebean83"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1560657"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1560657.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="coffeebean83" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1966701ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1966701" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1560657">coffeebean83</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-02">11/02/23 07:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First off this is a very unusual gourmand.  Definitely not for everyone.  It's has warm and cold notes but the cool wins out imo.   I get a very cool toned fudgy chocolate with a slight touch of the suede/oud and layered in the turmeric &amp; myrrh(that comes across a little minty/menthol).   For that reason I get winter vibes more so than fall.   I personally love it's uniqueness and will be enjoying wearing this during Nov/Dec/Jan.<br />
<br />
Edited to add:  Wore it the other day and realized, on my skin, it smelt almost like a chocolate covered pretzel...in the best way possible.   Loving this fragrance even more now tbh.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="1966701"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=1966701#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1873772" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Bonds best release in a while and I can arguably say this is their best gourmand ... even better than New Haarlem. Im obsessed...I can't wait for Bonds sale to get this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="1785787"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=1785787#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1754626" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1754626" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dabeyondobsessedemperor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1582152"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1582152.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dabeyondobsessedemperor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Celine/Black-Tie-57925.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57925.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Tie"title="Black Tie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1754626ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1754626" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1582152">dabeyondobsessedemperor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-07">02/07/23 21:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Okay, so like the person below me I wandered into my local Saks looking for a new cologne to add to my small collection, and the woman in charge of the Bond No. 9 section sprayed Chelsea Nights onto a paper for me and said, take this home. It might not smell like much now but trust me, the drydown is where its at. Damn, was she right. At first I thought it was maybe a bit heavy and cluttered and not really my style, but damn, that drydown? Its opulent and creamy and just a mix of suede and gourmand goodness. This is almost definitely going to be my next fragrance purchase as soon as Bond No. 9 runs a discount promo over at Saks since Im flat broke as of now.<br />
<br />
--<br />
<br />
UPDATE 4/14/2023: okay so I finally ended up buying this fragrance. The opening has more of a Middle Eastern vibe than I remembered, with its saffron. But the drydown is still the same sexy, delicious, addictive, chocolatey nirvana I remembered it to be. I will say this as a note of caution, though: apply carefully and delicately. This fragrance is VERY strong and heady, so 1-2 sprays of this should be enough. Trust me, you'll be projecting just fine with 1-2 sprays. And it'll last you until the next morning. What a great, well-worth it buy, honestly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="1754626"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=1754626#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1746214" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I went to try in Saks today and It smells so decadent and RICHHH! I have a nice sized sample, so I will be back to edit my review for the longevity :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="1746214"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=1746214#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1721316" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1721316" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Monteeze"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1584362"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1584362.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Monteeze" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1721316ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1721316" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1584362">Monteeze</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-30">12/30/22 19:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tried it as Saks today and damn.... I thought I would love it but it was nothing like the note breakdown and accords say, this is a 100% try before you by scent. Not for me, it was pretty gross to my nose and I usually love bond scents. But with that being said I only did a paper test.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="1721316"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=1721316#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1718661" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1718661" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fumongous"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1053478"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1053478.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fumongous" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gobin-Daude/Jardins-Ottomans-52493.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52493.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jardins Ottomans"title="Jardins Ottomans"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1718661ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1718661" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1053478">fumongous</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-27">12/27/22 16:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bummer, I didnt like this at all. Didnt get anything other than suede-oud-patchouli. Very similar to TF Tobacco Vanilla which I dont like either. I got none of the top or middle notes. I love saffron and NOPE, it was MIA for me. This fragrance house hasnt been successful for me yet. Best thing about this one is the bright bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="1718661"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=1718661#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1699513" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1699513" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SmokeyFlora"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1415541"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1415541.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SmokeyFlora" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.474.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Green Irish Tweed"title="Green Irish Tweed"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1699513ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1699513" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1415541">SmokeyFlora</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-30">11/30/22 17:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If identifying as non-binary was in a bottle, this is it. There is a lot going on with the juxtaposition of notes: is it sweet? Is it woody? Is it a gourmand?<br />
<br />
It works impressively well! You want to smell good but you truly want to be in neutral territory, wear this. There is something for everyones nose here.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="1699513"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=1699513#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1685407" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1682321" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vidalia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/229877"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.229877.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vidalia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Gardenia-92072.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92072.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="New York Gardenia"title="New York Gardenia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1682321ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1682321" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/229877">Vidalia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-06">11/06/22 08:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Chelsea Nights is an absolutely gorgeous scent. It is so incredibly sexy and lasts a long time. Definitely one of my favorite Bond perfumes and I love the way I feel when I wear it !<br />
Update- try layering/blending Chelsea Nights with Nomad- omg it is amazing !</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="1682321"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=1682321#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1679644" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1679644" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="samaisling"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1415215"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1415215.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="samaisling" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1679644ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1679644" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1415215">samaisling</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-02">11/02/22 18:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I sampled today at Saks and smelling my arm 6 hours later (something Ive done non stop all day) my initial thoughts are this. This is a gourmand for people who prefer Nutella to chocolate syrup, malts to shakes, the cake to the icing (hell they probably order the cheesecake instead of the brownie...).  In other words- a gourmand for those who enjoy sharing dessert, but can easily feel queasy when there isnt something there to cut down the sweet in some way. To that end, the saffron is so important and beautiful here (possibly paired with not just amber but ambroxan?). The tuberose note (not listed here but should be) is addicting. The rose, &amp; oud that som say they dont notice is there to further keep things from going off the sweet deep end, IMO.  The cacao is the powder sprinkled on top of Tiramasu, not a Hersheys bar. I am not a fragrance expert, just a fragrance lover, so take all with a grain of salt. but bottomline I am *extremely* sensitive and picky with gourmands and this is hella sexy. Probably adding to my FB wishlist.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="1679644"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=1679644#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1673385" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1673385" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GourmandGirl81"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1285273"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1285273.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GourmandGirl81" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Ani-54785.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54785.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ani"title="Ani"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1673385ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1673385" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1285273">GourmandGirl81</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-24">10/24/22 16:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tried this in a Saks yesterday and initially, I wasn't impressed. I did a paper test, and it went on very soft. I then did some shopping and went back to the counter and allowed for a skin test. BAYBEH!!!  I couldn't stop smelling my arm all day. I pick up the saffron, sesame, vanilla and the oud, which is similar to the oud in Nomad (not too heavy or dominant). This is one you definitely want people to catch a waft of, as it's dreamy. FBW for me, but definitely test!<br />
<br />
 24+ hours later and I sniffed my sample card and it's still there!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="1673385"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=1673385#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                    </div>
