<br />
 24+ hours later and I sniffed my sample card and it's still there!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="1673385"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=1673385#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1679644" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1679644" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="samaisling"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1415215"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1415215.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="samaisling" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1679644ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1679644" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1415215">samaisling</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-02">11/02/22 18:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I sampled today at Saks and smelling my arm 6 hours later (something Ive done non stop all day) my initial thoughts are this. This is a gourmand for people who prefer Nutella to chocolate syrup, malts to shakes, the cake to the icing (hell they probably order the cheesecake instead of the brownie...).  In other words- a gourmand for those who enjoy sharing dessert, but can easily feel queasy when there isnt something there to cut down the sweet in some way. To that end, the saffron is so important and beautiful here (possibly paired with not just amber but ambroxan?). The tuberose note (not listed here but should be) is addicting. The rose, &amp; oud that som say they dont notice is there to further keep things from going off the sweet deep end, IMO.  The cacao is the powder sprinkled on top of Tiramasu, not a Hersheys bar. I am not a fragrance expert, just a fragrance lover, so take all with a grain of salt. but bottomline I am *extremely* sensitive and picky with gourmands and this is hella sexy. Probably adding to my FB wishlist.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="1679644"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=1679644#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1785787" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1785787" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="s_raquidan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/300708"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.300708.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="s_raquidan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Miller-Harris/Myrica-Muse-76345.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76345.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Myrica Muse"title="Myrica Muse"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1785787ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1785787" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/300708">s_raquidan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-17">03/17/23 08:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tried this at  Neiman's and all I said was damn, damn, damn, DAMN! Bonds best release in a while and I can arguably say this is their best gourmand ... even better than New Haarlem. Im obsessed...I can't wait for Bonds sale to get this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="1785787"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=1785787#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1754626" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1754626" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dabeyondobsessedemperor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1582152"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1582152.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dabeyondobsessedemperor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Celine/Black-Tie-57925.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57925.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Tie"title="Black Tie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1754626ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1754626" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1582152">dabeyondobsessedemperor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-07">02/07/23 21:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Okay, so like the person below me I wandered into my local Saks looking for a new cologne to add to my small collection, and the woman in charge of the Bond No. 9 section sprayed Chelsea Nights onto a paper for me and said, take this home. It might not smell like much now but trust me, the drydown is where its at. Damn, was she right. At first I thought it was maybe a bit heavy and cluttered and not really my style, but damn, that drydown? Its opulent and creamy and just a mix of suede and gourmand goodness. This is almost definitely going to be my next fragrance purchase as soon as Bond No. 9 runs a discount promo over at Saks since Im flat broke as of now.<br />
<br />
--<br />
<br />
UPDATE 4/14/2023: okay so I finally ended up buying this fragrance. The opening has more of a Middle Eastern vibe than I remembered, with its saffron. But the drydown is still the same sexy, delicious, addictive, chocolatey nirvana I remembered it to be. I will say this as a note of caution, though: apply carefully and delicately. This fragrance is VERY strong and heady, so 1-2 sprays of this should be enough. Trust me, you'll be projecting just fine with 1-2 sprays. And it'll last you until the next morning. What a great, well-worth it buy, honestly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="1754626"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=1754626#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1699513" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1699513" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SmokeyFlora"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1415541"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1415541.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SmokeyFlora" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.474.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Green Irish Tweed"title="Green Irish Tweed"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1699513ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1699513" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1415541">SmokeyFlora</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-30">11/30/22 17:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If identifying as non-binary was in a bottle, this is it. There is a lot going on with the juxtaposition of notes: is it sweet? Is it woody? Is it a gourmand?<br />
<br />
It works impressively well! You want to smell good but you truly want to be in neutral territory, wear this. There is something for everyones nose here.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="1699513"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=1699513#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="76682" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2033104" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yolis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341217"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1341217.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yolis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Delina-43871.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43871.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Delina"title="Delina"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2033104ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2033104" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341217">Yolis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-16">01/16/24 18:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Patchouli, Cacao, Saffron, Hazelnut are pretty much all I smell. Very well blended because it feels very balanced, I just can't place any other particular note, but this fragrance IS smooth. A masculine (leaning unisex) buttery gourmand. Don't think it's quite right for me, but I can acknowledge it's a good fragrance for someone who would enjoy this scent profile. Heavy hitter too, go light on the sprays. This could choke somebody out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="2033104"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=2033104#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1721316" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2288429">jombajuiced</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-03">11/03/24 16:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm a sucker for cacao, and I wished they amplified the cacao more in this fragrance. I get more of the florals, leather, and woody notes more than the cacao itself. If you want something gourmand I'd steer away from this and look elsewhere. There's much better options for cheaper prices.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="2337114"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=2337114#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1718661" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1718661" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fumongous"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1053478"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1053478.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fumongous" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gobin-Daude/Jardins-Ottomans-52493.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52493.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jardins Ottomans"title="Jardins Ottomans"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1718661ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1718661" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1053478">fumongous</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-27">12/27/22 16:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bummer, I didnt like this at all. Didnt get anything other than suede-oud-patchouli. Very similar to TF Tobacco Vanilla which I dont like either. I got none of the top or middle notes. I love saffron and NOPE, it was MIA for me. This fragrance house hasnt been successful for me yet. Best thing about this one is the bright bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="1718661"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=1718661#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2024964" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2024964" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Xela_529"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545982"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1545982.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Xela_529" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ella-K-Parfums/Melodie-D-Altai-48471.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48471.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Melodie D'Altai"title="Melodie D'Altai"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2024964ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2024964" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545982">Xela_529</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-08">01/08/24 20:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm starting to think Bond No 9 isn't the house for me. I have a couple of favorites, but a lot of what I've tried from them is a big miss for me. Chelsea Nights was the biggest let down of them all. I was SUPER excited to try her, what a bummer. <br />
<br />
I chuckled a little when I came across a Fragrantica article and the author described it as "oud butter". That's the perfect description, but it literally smells like butter. Think clarified butter they use in an American diner on the griddle. That plus the fun &amp; desirable notes that are listed. But the butter smell just ruins it for me. Womp Womp! I also interpret it as being super masculine.<br />
<br />
It seems like Bond really excels at marketing vs the actual juice in their fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76682"comment_id="2024964"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chelsea-Nights-76682.html?ccid=2024964#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="76682" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="search-reviews"><search-perfume-reviews :perfume_id="76682":random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]"></search-perfume-reviews></div></div><foundation-tabs></foundation-tabs></reviews-wrapper></div><perfume-shortcut-menu :perfume_id="76682" when-hidden="#toptop"></perfume-shortcut-menu><initialize-status-data></initialize-status-data><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_footer -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300 __728x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_footer" v-pre>
</div></div></div>

                        <span class="ztworowseclipse">Myrurgia - The Art of Perfume Part II</span>
        </a>
        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"

</div>                        <div id="popBrands" class="strike-title" style="margin-top: 4em;"><span>Most Popular Perfumes</span></div>
            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-y grid-margin-x text-center">
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">1.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Khamrah-75805.html" class="en2inter">Khamrah Lattafa Perfumes</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">2.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Elixir-81642.html" class="en2inter">Le Male Elixir Jean Paul Gaultier</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">3.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/By-Kilian/Angels-Share-62615.html" class="en2inter">Angels&#039; Share By Kilian</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">4.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Le-Parfum-61856.html" class="en2inter">Le Male Le Parfum Jean Paul Gaultier</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            </div>
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">5.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Xerjoff/XJ-1861-Naxos-30529.html" class="en2inter">XJ 1861 Naxos Xerjoff</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">6.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/By-the-Fireplace-31623.html" class="en2inter">By the Fireplace Maison Martin Margiela</a>
        </span>
    </div>

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });

</script>
